Body:
"""Test that changing the time horizon of time-integrated airborne
    fraction makes a material difference to the carbon cycle."""
C1, F1, T1 = fair.forward.fair_scm(emissions=rcp85.Emissions.co2,
    useMultigas=False)
C2, F2, T2 = fair.forward.fair_scm(emissions=rcp85.Emissions.co2,
    useMultigas=False, iirf_h=100)
with pytest.warns(RuntimeWarning):
    C3, F3, T3 = fair.forward.fair_scm(emissions=rcp85.Emissions.co2,
        useMultigas=False, iirf_h=60)
C4, F4, T4 = fair.forward.fair_scm(emissions=rcp85.Emissions.co2,
    useMultigas=False, iirf_h=60, iirf_max=58)
assert np.all(C1 == C2)
assert np.all(F1 == F2)
assert np.all(T1 == T2)
assert np.any(C2 != C4)
assert np.any(F2 != F4)
assert np.any(T2 != T4)
assert np.any(C3 != C4)
assert np.any(F3 != F4)
assert np.any(T3 != T4)
